SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id FROM elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype WHERE dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id = :dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_DEALERID_COVERAGETYPEID: SELECT dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id FROM elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype WHERE dealer_id = :dealer_id and coverage_type_id = :coverage_type_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, coverage_type_id = :coverage_type_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id = :dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_dealer_clm_aprove_covtype ( dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_by, dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :coverage_type_id, :created_by, :dealer_clm_aprove_covtype_id )
